name: Ronald GONTARCHICK, Susan Ann Gontarchick, his Wife; Marlin Reed, Mary Jane Reed, his Wife; and Matthew Reed, their Son, Petitioners v. CITY OF POTTSVILLE, Respondent

parties: Ronald GONTARCHICK, Susan Ann Gontarchick, his Wife; Marlin Reed, Mary Jane Reed, his Wife; and Matthew Reed, their Son, Petitioners v. CITY OF POTTSVILLE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 17th day of December, 2009, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue, as stated by Petitioner, is:
Whether the Commonwealth Court opinion and order departs from the accepted and usual course of judicial proceedings in matters of statutory construction?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
987 A.2d 638
Ronald GONTARCHICK, Susan Ann Gontarchick, his Wife; Marlin Reed, Mary Jane Reed, his Wife; and Matthew Reed, their Son, Petitioners v. CITY OF POTTSVILLE, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Dec. 17, 2009.
